snippet: The United Nations said an agreement still required finalization to ensure the safety of the investigators.
abstract: Visit by United Nations officials to Syria to inspect three sites where chemical weapons may have been used in country’s civil war has been delayed because agreement has yet to be reached with Syria on measures to ensure their safety.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations said an agreement still required finalization to ensure the safety of the investigators.

headline.main: Safety Concerns Delay U.N. Chemical Arms Inquiry in Syria

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
